attributes.action: Please put pressure on Australian Government to provide enough security for Indian Students.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every day we are reading in news that Students from Indian subcontinent are being attacked in Australia.I think it is  the responsibilty of Every country to put pressure on Australian government since  both Australia and UK are  the members of UN.Government of UK has got Bilateral relationship with Australia,India.Moreover almost around 30000 students are studying in Uk universities which will defnietly affect the Universities of UK.
